wikipedia_page.main: Christopher John Turner, CBE (17 August 1933 – 30 October 2014) was a British diplomat.

link_mentions.page: Governor of the Turks and Caicos Islands

response: John Clifford Strong (14 January 1922 – 24 September 2003) was Governor of the Turks and Caicos from August 1978 to September 1982. Strong was succeeded by Christopher J. Turner in October 1982. He died in September 2003 at the age of 81.Probate Search: John Clifford Strong
*Christopher J. Turner (1933–2014), diplomat and Governor of Montserrat
**Christopher J. Turner, 81, diplomat, Governor of the Turks and Caicos Islands (1982–1987) and Montserrat (1987–1990).
*Christopher J. Turner, 81, British diplomat, Governor of the Turks and Caicos Islands (1982–1987) and Montserrat (1987–1990).TURNER
* Christopher J. Turner (1933–2014), Governor of the Turks and Caicos and of Montserrat

link_mentions.page: List of governors of dependent territories in the 20th century

response: *Christopher J. Turner (1933–2014), Governor of the Turks and Caicos from 1982 to 1987 and Governor of Montserrat from 1987 to 1990
